elements.content:
Table 2 3D hybrid vanadates constructed from inorganic layers pillared by organic ligands
Compound Vanadium oxide subunit Metal–organic substructure Dimensionalitya Ref.
a The crystal structure dimensionality is described as the sum of the metal organic substructure dimensionality plus the inorganic scaffold dimensionality.
{Ni2(H2O)2(Pz)}(V4O12) {V4O12} cycles Ni2N2O2(H2O)-Pz chains. 2D + 1D→3D 15
{Co(4Bpy)}(VO3)2 {V4O12} cycles Co(4Bpy) chains. 2D + 1D→3D 16
[{Ag(4Bpy)}4(V4O12)]·2H2O {V4O12} cycles {Ag(4Bpy)} chains. 2D + 1D→3D 17
[{Ni(H2O)(Bpa)}(VO3)2]·2H2O {V4O12} cycles {Ni(H2O)(Bpa)} chains. 2D + 1D→3D This work
{Co(Bpa)}(VO3)2 {V4O12} cycles {Co(Bpa)}parallel chains. 2D + 1D→3D This work
{M2(H2O)2(Bbi)}(VO3)4 M = Co, Mn Metavanadate chains of corner-sharing VO4 tetrahedra {M2(H2O)2(Bbi)} chains. 2D + 1D→3D 18
{Cu3(Trz)2}(V4O12) {V4O12} cycles Cu3(Trz)2 chains. 2D + 1D→3D 19
[{Mn(4Bpy)}(VO3)2]·1.16H2O Metavanadate chains of edge-sharing VO5 polyhedra {Mn(4Bpy)} layers. 2D+2D→3D 20
[{Mn(4Bpy)0.5}(VO3)2]·0.62H2O Metavanadate chains of edge-sharing VO5 polyhedra {Mn(4Bpy)0.5} discrete layers. 2D + 2D→3D 20
[{Ag(Bpa)}4(V4O12)]·4H2O {V4O12} cycles {Ag(Bpa)} chains corner linked giving rise to metal–organic layers. 2D + 2D→3D 18
{Ni(Bpe)}(VO3)2 Metavanadate chains of corner-sharing VO4 tetrahedra. Interpenetrated {Ni(Bpe)} rhombic like metal–organic layers. 2D + (2D + 2D)→ 3D 21

| [{Ag(4Bpy)}<small><sub>4</sub></small>(V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>)]·2H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O | {V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>} cycles | {Ag(4Bpy)} chains. | 2D + 1D→3D | [17](#cit17) |
| [{Ni(H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O)(Bpa)}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>2</sub></small>]·2H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O | {V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>} cycles | {Ni(H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O)(Bpa)} chains. | 2D + 1D→3D | This work |
| {Co(Bpa)}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>2</sub></small> | {V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>} cycles | {Co(Bpa)}parallel chains. | 2D + 1D→3D | This work |
| {M<small><sub>2</sub></small>(H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O)<small><sub>2</sub></small>(Bbi)}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>4</sub></small> M = Co, Mn | Metavanadate chains of corner-sharing VO<small><sub>4</sub></small> tetrahedra | {M<small><sub>2</sub></small>(H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O)<small><sub>2</sub></small>(Bbi)} chains. | 2D + 1D→3D | [18](#cit18) |
| {Cu<small><sub>3</sub></small>(Trz)<small><sub>2</sub></small>}(V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>) | {V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>} cycles | Cu3(Trz)<small><sub>2</sub></small> chains. | 2D + 1D→3D | [19](#cit19) |
| [{Mn(4Bpy)}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>2</sub></small>]·1.16H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O | Metavanadate chains of edge-sharing VO<small><sub>5</sub></small> polyhedra | {Mn(4Bpy)} layers. | 2D+2D→3D | [20](#cit20) |
| [{Mn(4Bpy)<small><sub>0.5</sub></small>}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>2</sub></small>]·0.62H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O | Metavanadate chains of edge-sharing VO<small><sub>5</sub></small> polyhedra | {Mn(4Bpy)<small><sub>0.5</sub></small>} discrete layers. | 2D + 2D→3D | [20](#cit20) |
| [{Ag(Bpa)}<small><sub>4</sub></small>(V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>)]·4H<small><sub>2</sub></small>O | {V<small><sub>4</sub></small>O<small><sub>12</sub></small>} cycles | {Ag(Bpa)} chains corner linked giving rise to metal–organic layers. | 2D + 2D→3D | [18](#cit18) |
| {Ni(Bpe)}(VO<small><sub>3</sub></small>)<small><sub>2</sub></small> | Metavanadate chains of corner-sharing VO<small><sub>4</sub></small> tetrahedra. | Interpenetrated {Ni(Bpe)} rhombic like metal–organic layers. | 2D + (2D + 2D)→ 3D | [21](#cit21) |

[^a]: The crystal structure dimensionality is described as the sum of the metal organic substructure dimensionality plus the inorganic scaffold dimensionality.
